DIRECTOR OF FINANCE
Executive Profile
Dynamic, results-oriented Controller with over 25 years of experience, demonstrating expertise in financial reporting and analysis.
Strong track record in creating and implementing internal controls, to reduce the risk of fraud, exposure and loss.
Created SOD to increase efficiency and set standards for compliance within the finance department.
Applied testing processes and procedures to improve financial operations.
Hands on Manager who is effective at creating a team environment.
Proficient plus in all aspects of General Ledger, BS and P&L financial reporting.
Well versed in treasury management and reporting across numerous industries as well as internal and external audits and regulatory compliance.
Skill Highlights
Financial Management Financial Reporting and Analysis Maintain/Update General Ledger
Treasury Management ●Process Improvement & Finance Controls● Implementation Sarbannes-Oxley Compliance GL Account reconciliations Sales Commission Analysis Sales D&A analysis Inventory Reconciliation
Customer relations Payroll Management ● Staff Training & Management ●Accounts Payable & Receivable

Oracle Financials ●●
QuickBooks Asset Keeper Discovery Payroll Excel 2013

Core Accomplishments
Developed financial controls that successfully scaled as the company grew in annual revenues.
Hired and trained a defined accounting department and established SOD to reduce risk of fraud and exposure.
Successfully managed annual audits in which no material weakness were noted by auditors.
Assisted in accelerating month end closing processes to the 5th business day of every month.
Provided timely and accurate financial reports on operating entities.
Negotiated discount terms with Vendors not currently offering.
Recaptured 100K+ of lost D&A costs and created/reclassed accounts for better analysis and financial reporting for sales team.
Worked with plant manager and department heads to create Purchase order template and approval controls to reduce lost time and money.
Worked in creating AR processes to ensure timely collection of all accounts falling into the 30 day and over buckets.

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

<JD_START>
Job Title: Revenue Accountant

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
Level Access is a leading accessibility solutions provider, dedicated to ensuring digital equality for all individuals!

We are seeking a meticulous and expert Revenue Accountant to join our finance team! As a Revenue Accountant, you will be responsible for accurately recording and reporting revenue transactions, ensuring compliance with accounting principles and regulations, and supporting financial analysis and reporting processes.

Key Responsibilities

Record and reconcile revenue transactions: Accurately record revenue transactions in accordance with accounting standards and company policies. Reconcile revenue accounts to ensure completeness and accuracy of financial data.Revenue recognition: Apply appropriate revenue recognition principles based on the nature of revenue transactions, including software licenses, subscriptions, and services in accordance with ASC606 regulations.Financial analysis: Assist in financial analysis by providing insights into revenue trends, variances, and performance metrics. Prepare reports and presentations for management review.Compliance and audit support: Ensure compliance with accounting standards, regulations, and internal controls related to revenue recognition. Support external audits by providing documentation and explanations as needed.Process improvement: Identify opportunities to improve revenue accounting processes, systems, and controls. Implement changes to improve efficiency, accuracy, and effectiveness.Cross-functional teamwork: Collaborate with cross-functional teams including sales, legal, and operations to ensure alignment on revenue-related matters and resolve issues in a timely manner.Ad hoc projects: Participate in special projects and initiatives as assigned by management, such as system implementations, process enhancements, and financial planning activities.

Qualifications

Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in Accounting, Finance, or related field. CPA or equivalent certification is a plus.3+ years of experience in revenue accounting or related roles, preferably in a software or technology company.Strong understanding of revenue recognition principles (ASC 606) and experience with revenue accounting software.Proficiency in Microsoft Excel and financial analysis tools.Excellent analytical skills with attention to detail and accuracy.Effective communication skills with the ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams and develop processes as needed.Proactive attitude with a focus on continuous improvement and problem-solving.NetSuite experience preferred.Experience working with cloud-based billing platforms is a plus.Experience with Salesforce CRM preferred.Experience with a high volume of monthly transactions is a plus.

Application Process

If you are looking to contribute to a dynamic and fast-paced environment while growing your career in accounting, we invite you to apply for this exciting opportunity with Level Access. This is a full-time salaried position with a competitive benefits package, including bonus opportunities and unlimited vacation/FTO. Salary is commensurate with experience. Please submit your cover letter and resume for immediate consideration.

Level Access is committed to workforce diversity. Equal Opportunity Employer. Copyright 2024, Level Access. All rights reserved.

We will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us to request accommodation.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
<JD_END>
